UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Resistance to dermcidin-derived peptides is independent of bacterial protease activity.
Literature.Author: Senyürek I, Döring G, Kalbacher H, Deeg M, Peschel A, Wolz C, Schittek B

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(IC90=30±5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1-A1(IC90=40.5±0.7µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1-B1(IC90=39±5.2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1-A1B1(IC90=32±5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(IC90=15±8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 113(IC90=12±1.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus Newman(IC90=9±2.6µg/ml)
